T02D1932:49b-1: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D1932:49b-3: gshin rje'i gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1932:49b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1932:49b-5: snying rjes sems can phan pa mdzad cing dpag bsam shing dang 'dra ba yi //
T02D1932:49b-6: dpal ldan gshin rje'i gshed kyi mdangs 'bar char sprin gzhon 'dra yid 'ong ba //
T02D1932:49b-7: rtog pa'i rlabs bral lhan cig skyes pa'i 'o ma las 'phros de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1932:49b-8: 'di yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub bya dang bcas dpal ldan bla ma'i bka' yis bshad par bya ;
T02D1932:49b-9: / dang phor sngags pas phyi nang gi rnam par g-yo bam lus pa yongs su btang la /
T02D1932:49b-10: blo dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan pas rang
T02D1932:49b-11: gi snying gar thugs kyi sa bon gyi sngags 'od
T02D1932:49b-12: zer gyi rigs kun du 'khrigs pa bltas la /
T02D1932:49b-13: 'od 'phros pa de las phyogs skyong ba brgyad /
T02D1932:49b-14: shing brgyad kyis brgyan cing drag po'i dur khrod do //
T02D1932:49b-15: de'i dkyil du 'jigs pa dang bral bas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug la /
T02D1932:49b-16: sems can la phan pa'i phyir bsam gtan la spyad par bya ste /
T02D1932:49b-17: sa bon de las 'od 'phros pas rang gi ba
T02D1932:50a-0: spu'i bu ga las phyir byung ba'i kha dog @50a
T02D1932:50a-1: * // lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od kyis bdag nyid rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1932:50a-2: de nyid kyis 'gro ba rigs drug na 'khor ba'i sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bltas pas /
T02D1932:50a-3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo nyid du 'gro bar blta'o //
T02D1932:50a-4: de nas 'od zer des spyan drangs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1932:50a-5: dpal gshin rje gshed la sogs pa spyan drangs te
T02D1932:50a-6: mdun du zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs par bltas la
T02D1932:50a-7: / phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02D1932:50a-8: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1932:50a-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa chen po mchod par bgyi'o //
T02D1932:50a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag bgyi'o //
T02D1932:50a-11: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D1932:50a-12: bdag nyid sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so
T02D1932:50a-13: // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02D1932:50a-14: 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1932:50a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul bar bgyi'o //
T02D1932:50a-16: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa'i sangs
T02D1932:50a-17: rgyas thams cad la bskal pa mang por bzhugs par
T02D1932:50a-19: mchod pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa bdun nam /
T02D1932:50a-20: gzhan yang gang ji skad gsungs pa'i dge ba ma
T02D1932:50a-21: lus pa de dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1932:50a-22: tu bsngo'o // de'i rjes la gsum la skyabs su
T02D1932:50a-23: 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun
T02D1932:50a-24: la skyabs su mchi'o zhes 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D1932:50a-25: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D1932:50a-26: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas thams
T02D1932:50a-27: cad du sems can gyi don yangs pa bgyi'o zhes
T02D1932:50a-28: so // de nas bdag gi lus dbul te sangs
T02D1932:50a-29: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag nyid
T02D1932:50a-31: de nas lam gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1932:50a-32: ji ltar yang bla na med pa'i lam rdo rje
T02D1932:50a-33: sems dpa'i snying po gshin rje'i gshed bdag gis gzung
T02D1932:50a-34: bar bgyi'o // de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang /
T02D1932:50a-35: dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi ngo bo tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1932:50b-0: de'i rjes la dngos @50b po thams cad sems tsam
T02D1932:50b-1: gyi rang bzhin pas dngos po ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D1932:50b-3: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1932:50b-4: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1932:50b-5: zhes sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1932:50b-7: 'di las lhag pa'i srung ba'i don ni /
T02D1932:50b-8: yi ge re yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma la
T02D1932:50b-9: gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las byung ba'i sna tshogs
T02D1932:50b-10: rdo rje las spros pa'i rdo rje ra ba dang
T02D1932:50b-12: rdo rje dur khrod dang bcas par rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgom mo //
T02D1932:50b-13: yang dur khrod rnams 'di ltar 'byung ste /
T02D1932:50b-14: rdo rje'i phyogs su sh'ir sha ste //
T02D1932:50b-15: gnod sbyin lag g-yas spyi blugs dang //
T02D1932:50b-16: g-yon na thod pa thogs pa yi //
T02D1932:50b-17: tsanda zhes pa'i mdog ser gnas //
T02D1932:50b-18: gnod sbyin dpal 'dzin dmar po ste //
T02D1932:50b-19: g-yas pa na ni phreng ba dang //
T02D1932:50b-20: g-yon na thod pa'i snod thogs te //
T02D1932:50b-21: men ka ram dza shing la'o //
T02D1932:50b-22: gshin rje'i gshed ni ts'u ta la //
T02D1932:50b-23: rnam 'jigs zhes bya'i mdog nag po'i //
T02D1932:50b-24: g-yas pa na ni dbyug pa dang //
T02D1932:50b-25: g-yon pa chu skyes snod yin no //
T02D1932:50b-26: bden bral g-yas gri gug dang //
T02D1932:50b-27: g-yon na chu skyes snod thogs pa'i //
T02D1932:50b-28: ser po go ra aandha kar //
T02D1932:50b-30: chu ni mya ngan med shing la //
T02D1932:50b-31: 'od kyi phreng can mgo yi rus //
T02D1932:50b-32: dkar pho g-yas na klu zhags dang //
T02D1932:50b-33: g-yon na chu skyes snod thogs pa'o //
T02D1932:50b-34: rlung na ki la ki ra ba //
T02D1932:50b-35: sngon po g-yas na gos sngon thogs //
T02D1932:50b-36: g-yon pa na ni chu skyes snod //
T02D1932:50b-37: aardzu na yi shing la gnas //
T02D1932:50b-38: ku be ra na gha ba dar //
T02D1932:50b-39: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje dang //
T02D1932:50b-40: g-yon pa na ni padma'i snod //
T02D1932:50b-41: aa shvad tha la mnan nas gnas //
T02D1932:50b-42: gnod sbyin gad mo cher grags pa //
T02D1932:50b-43: dkar po g-yas na rtse gsum pa //
T02D1932:50b-44: g-yon pa na ni padma'i snod //
T02D1932:50b-45: dbang ldan shing chen po la gnas //
T02D1932:50b-46: thams cad shing las lus phyed bton //
T02D1932:50b-47: drag cing 'bar la skra dang ni //
T02D1932:50b-48: sma ra smin ma lkog spu dang //
T02D1932:50b-49: rdzi ma'ang ser po khros pa'i zhal //
T02D1932:50b-50: spyan gsum dmar po rab 'gul ba //
T02D1932:50b-51: mche ba drag tu gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1932:50b-52: shing 'di rnams kyi rtsa ba ru //
T02D1932:50b-53: gsal shing gis phug ro yang bzhag / kha cig ltung ba'i ro dag dang //
T02D1932:50b-54: khyi dang bya rgod za ba'o //
T02D1932:50b-55: de la yang dag ros myos pa'i //
T02D1932:50b-56: rnal 'byor pa dag glu len te //
T02D1932:51a-2: rnam par sbyong zhing rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1932:51a-3: bdud rtsi lnga ldan thod pa dang //
T02D1932:51a-4: chags pas dpal la 'dud byed cing //
T02D1932:51a-5: 'gro ba gsum po tshim par byed //
T02D1932:51a-6: des na rig pa dang bcas pa'i dpal mchog dang
T02D1932:51a-7: po las byung ba'i chos 'byung zhes bya ba'i phyag
T02D1932:51a-8: rgya gru gsum gyi nang nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1932:51a-9: kyi dkyil na gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D1932:51a-11: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D1932:51a-12: zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge bhr'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1932:51a-14: de'i lte ba la zla ba la gnas pa'i yi
T02D1932:51a-15: ge bhr'um yongs su gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1932:51a-16: rig pa dang bcas pa las byung ba'i sna tshogs
T02D1932:51a-17: par snang ba'i nor bu'i rang bzhin kha dog lnga
T02D1932:51a-19: phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag
T02D1932:51a-20: tu med par sangs rgyas kyis khyab par gnas pa
T02D1932:51a-21: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02D1932:51a-22: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa /
T02D1932:51a-23: se mo do dang do shal dang /
T02D1932:51a-24: me long dang gos dang nor bus rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1932:51a-25: mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1932:51a-26: de'i dkyil du yi ge re yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bltas la /
T02D1932:51a-27: de'i steng du yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1932:51a-28: sna tshogs rdo rje bsgoms pa byas la /
T02D1932:51a-29: lha bcu bdun gyi gdan sna tshogs padma bsgom mo //
T02D1932:51a-30: de'i lte ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab
T02D1932:51a-31: kyi ngo bo nyid yi ge aa la sogs pa
T02D1932:51a-32: nyis 'gyur du byas pa bzhugs te /
T02D1932:51a-33: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par blta'o //
T02D1932:51a-34: de'i steng du re las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1932:51a-35: 'khor la thabs kyi ngo bo nyid nyis 'gyur du
T02D1932:51a-36: byas pa las / da dha da dha ya la
T02D1932:51a-37: bsnan pa'i yi ge ka la sogs pa gsal byed
T02D1932:51a-38: byas pa las / rnams bcug la ; dpe byad
T02D1932:51a-39: bzang po brgyad cus brgyan par rnam par bsams te
T02D1932:51a-40: byas pa las / rnams bcug la ; / de dag thams cad ro mnyam par byas la /
T02D1932:51a-41: de gnyis ka'i yang nang du 'dus pa'i h'um las
T02D1932:51a-42: byung ba'i rdo rje sngon po la gnas pa'i zla
T02D1932:51a-43: ba'i gdan la yi ge h'um rnam par bsams la
T02D1932:51b-0: / de'i 'od kyis reg pas byon par @51b bzhed
T02D1932:51b-1: pa'i phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang
T02D1932:51b-2: lha mo rnams de'i nang du byon par bsams la
T02D1932:51b-3: / / de nas de'i nga rgyal spang bar bya ste /
T02D1932:51b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes so //
T02D1932:51b-5: de nas de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' zhal dang /
T02D1932:51b-6: rgyan thams cad gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba la /
T02D1932:51b-7: lhan cig skyes pa tsam gyi rig ma can /
T02D1932:51b-8: sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po ste zhal gsum pa /
T02D1932:51b-9: g-yas pa'i phyag dang de las gzhan pa'i phyag rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1932:51b-10: rdo rje sngon po 'bar zhing 'phro ba dang /
T02D1932:51b-15: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yi shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1932:51b-16: de nas sa bon gyi lha mo'i mgo dang /
T02D1932:51b-18: snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams dang /
T02D1932:51b-19: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i yi ge
T02D1932:51b-20: rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par
T02D1932:51b-21: bya ste / rigs lnga gcig tu bsdus pas dgod par bya'o //
T02D1932:51b-22: de'i rjes la h'um aom h'um a'a: zhes pa'i sngags
T02D1932:51b-23: 'dis gnyi ga'i rdo rje dang padma rnam par sbyang
T02D1932:51b-24: bar bya'o // de'i rjes la yi ge ho: dmar
T02D1932:51b-25: po gnyis gnyi ga'i mthar rnam par bskor la dga'
T02D1932:51b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1932:51b-28: na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya
T02D1932:51b-29: bas so // de nas 'dod chags chen po nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1932:51b-30: rang ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i sa bon gyi
T02D1932:51b-31: 'od kyis bkug pa'i rdo rje tsa rtsi k'a la
T02D1932:51b-32: sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1932:51b-33: thams cad bdag gi lus kyi nang du bsgoms la
T02D1932:51b-34: / bdag nyid kyang rig ma dang bcas pa /
T02D1932:51b-35: 'dod chags chen po'i dbang gi yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i khu ba'i gzugs su blta'o //
T02D1932:51b-36: de nas rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcur khyab pas /
T02D1932:51b-37: 'gro ba drug na 'khor ba'i sems can rnam par sbyangs nas /
T02D1932:51b-38: de'i nang du chud par bsgoms la /
T02D1932:51b-39: de yang khu ba'i gzugs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D1932:51b-40: de nas ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i phyir /
T02D1932:51b-41: lha mo bzhis thugs la bstod pa //
T02D1932:51b-42: snying rjes khros pa'i dad sgrol bzhengs //
T02D1932:52a-2: dad sgrol rtsol med ma bzhugs bzhengs //
T02D1932:52a-3: bdud 'di dag las rgyal bar mdzod //
T02D1932:52a-4: 'jig rten mgon pos stong nyid ci ste bzhugs //
T02D1932:52a-5: dang sgrol 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhengs shig / byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten /
T02D1932:52a-7: ji ltar stong pa nyid ni sems par byed //
T02D1932:52a-9: skar mda' 'pho ba bzhin du de nyid du zhugs par gyur to //
T02D1932:52a-10: de nas lha mo bzhi yang khu ba der rab
T02D1932:52a-11: tu zhugs pas yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D1932:52a-12: kyis rang bzhin gyis lha'i ngo bo nyid du bkod
T02D1932:52a-13: la / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i lha'i sa bon blta ste /
T02D1932:52a-15: yatstsha ni r'a dza do ru da na yo ni
T02D1932:52a-16: r'a zhes bya ba 'di lta bu mtshams bzhi ru'o
T02D1932:52a-17: // de'i dkyil du ma lus pa la rang gi
T02D1932:52a-18: sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi nang du 'dus pa'i
T02D1932:52a-19: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang
T02D1932:52a-20: // / lha mo ma lus pa byon nas /
T02D1932:52a-21: byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i rnam pa der bzhugs te /
T02D1932:52a-22: de rnams zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya ste /
T02D1932:52a-23: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya'o //
T02D1932:52a-24: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
T02D1932:52a-25: shes dang ldan pa ste 'di ni rnal 'byor ro
T02D1932:52a-26: // de'i rjes la rdo rje tsa rtsi k'a la
T02D1932:52a-27: sogs pa lha mo bzhi po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i
T02D1932:52a-28: ngo bos bskul ba'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D1932:52a-29: de'i khu ba las byung ba'i nyi ma la gnas
T02D1932:52a-30: pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las aindra
T02D1932:52a-31: n'i la'i 'od ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i lte ba
T02D1932:52a-32: la gnas pa'i rigs kyi yi ges byin gyis rlob
T02D1932:52a-33: cing 'phro ba ; yi ge yam las yang dag par byung ba /
T02D1932:52a-34: aindra n'i la lta bu'i 'od can /
T02D1932:52a-37: g-yas pa dang gzhan la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1932:52a-38: sngon po dang dkar po dmar ba'i zhal can /
T02D1932:52a-42: 'khor lo dang padma dmar po dang /
T02D1932:52a-44: g-yas pa dang de las gzhan pa la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1932:52a-46: thod pa drug gis bskor bas mgo brgyan pa /
T02D1932:52a-47: phyogs bcur blta ba'i dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02D1932:52b-0: dga' bo dang @52b nyer dags gyen du 'bar ba'i skra bcings pa /
T02D1932:52b-1: mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing lce 'dril ba sma
T02D1932:52b-2: ra dang smin ma ser po rdo rjes brgyan pa
T02D1932:52b-4: mi'u thung ltar gsus pa che bar 'dzin pa ba su kis sa ral nye bar brgyan pa /
T02D1932:52b-5: stod du seng ge'i pags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1932:52b-6: lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad gyen du g-yas su 'khyil zhing 'od 'phro ba /
T02D1932:52b-7: rol pa dang bcas pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i shes
T02D1932:52b-8: rab dang gnyis su med pa'i sku hr'i: shtri: la
T02D1932:52b-9: sogs pa mgur nas brjod cing /
T02D1932:52b-10: ma he la gnas pa'i gshin rje'i rgyab tu nyi
T02D1932:52b-11: ma'i gdan la g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i
T02D1932:52b-12: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed du bsgom par bya'o /
T02D1932:52b-13: de'i snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yam las
T02D1932:52b-14: byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i lte ba la nyi
T02D1932:52b-15: ma dang / de la sa bon yam bsgom zhing phyag mtshan dang /
T02D1932:52b-16: sa bon yongs su gyur pa las ye shes sems
T02D1932:52b-17: dpa' gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba'i snying gar nyi
T02D1932:52b-18: ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nyi ma
T02D1932:52b-19: la gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon gyi byin gyis
T02D1932:52b-20: brlabs la snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1932:52b-21: rang gi sa bon las kyang 'od zer spros la
T02D1932:52b-22: 'od des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye
T02D1932:52b-24: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
T02D1932:52b-25: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D1932:52b-26: rang gi ye shes sems dpa' bcug la der byin gyis brlab pa yang bya ste /
T02D1932:52b-27: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'o //
T02D1932:52b-28: de nas snying ga'i 'og tu zla ba la gnas
T02D1932:52b-29: pa'i h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i lte bar zla
T02D1932:52b-30: ba de las sa bon rnam par bsams te /
T02D1932:52b-31: rang gi phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur
T02D1932:52b-32: pa las zhe sdang gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba
T02D1932:52b-33: la gnas pa phyag mtshan sa bon gyi byin gyis
T02D1932:52b-34: brlabs pa / snying po thugs rdo rje rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1932:52b-35: rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyi thugs rdo rje'i
T02D1932:52b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad bkug la mdun du zla ba
T02D1932:52b-37: la bzhugs te / yang dag par mchod nas rang
T02D1932:52b-38: gi thugs rdo rje la bcug la byin gyis brlab
T02D1932:52b-39: la bzhugs te / par bya ste / aom sarba
T02D1932:52b-40: ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma
T02D1932:52b-42: de bzhin du sku rdo rje ni gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1932:53a-1: rdo rje ni 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dang 'dra bar rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1932:53a-2: sku rdo rje dang gsung rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkug la yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1932:53a-3: nang du bzhugs pa byas la //
T02D1932:53a-4: de'i byin gyis brlab pa yang bya ste /
T02D1932:53a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1932:53a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1932:53a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1932:53a-9: de'i rjes la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D1932:53a-10: mig la kshim gi sa bon las sa'i snying po /
T02D1932:53a-11: rna ba la dzrim las phyag na rdo rje /
T02D1932:53a-12: sna la kham las nam mkha'i snying po /
T02D1932:53a-13: zhal du gam las 'jig rten dbang phyug / mgo
T02D1932:53a-14: la ksham las sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
T02D1932:53a-15: ba / snying ga'i 'og tu sam las kun du bzang po ste /
T02D1932:53a-16: skye mched 'di rnams la de rnams kyi padma dang zla ba la gnas pa /
T02D1932:53a-17: zla ba'i steng du phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1932:53a-18: phyis nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon
T02D1932:53a-19: las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1932:53a-20: gyi 'khor lo thams cad mi bskyod pas gtso bo
T02D1932:53a-21: byas pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D1932:53a-22: de las 'phros pa'i lha mo lnga rnams kyis bdud
T02D1932:53a-23: rtsi lnga'i khu ba rnams kyis bkang ba'i bum pa'i
T02D1932:53a-25: bdag nyid la dbang bskur nas /
T02D1932:53a-26: cod pan la mi bskyod pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1932:53a-27: yang rdo rje sems dpa' khu ba'i gzugs las byung
T02D1932:53a-28: ba'i gshin rje gshed bzhin du rig ma rang gi
T02D1932:53a-29: ngo bo yang mdun du bltas la /
T02D1932:53a-30: bskyed cing rang gi lus su 'dus par byas la /
T02D1932:53a-31: aom h'um sva aam h'a zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di rnams mgo dang /
T02D1932:53a-32: snying ga dang lte ba dang /
T02D1932:53a-34: pus mo rnams la rnam par bkod la /
T02D1932:53a-35: des rigs lnga bsdus pas brgyan par bya'o //
T02D1932:53a-36: aom h'um h'um aa 'dis ni rdo rje dang /
T02D1932:53a-37: padma rnam par sbyangs la gnyi ga'i mthar yi ge ho: dmar po gnyi ga bkod la /
T02D1932:53a-38: aom aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes brjod de /
T02D1932:53a-39: bla na med pa'i bde ba la mngon par phyogs nas /
T02D1932:53a-40: dga' ba brtsam par bya zhing der byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1932:53a-41: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1932:53a-42: na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pa
T02D1932:53b-1: de ltar don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pa'i
T02D1932:53b-2: rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis
T02D1932:53b-3: bkug pa'i lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1932:53b-4: lnga rnams rang gi sa bon gyi nang du bsams
T02D1932:53b-5: la / 'dod chags chen po'i dbang gis padma'i nang
T02D1932:53b-6: gi nor bu nas rang gi lte ba'i zla ba
T02D1932:53b-7: la mngon par byung bar bsams la /
T02D1932:53b-8: de'i rjes la de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i h'um
T02D1932:53b-9: gi sa bon las yang dag par byung ba'i mi
T02D1932:53b-10: bskyod pa gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba'i yi ge
T02D1932:53b-11: bcu pa'i sngags kyi sa bskul ba /
T02D1932:53b-12: aom badzra dhrik ces bya ba 'dis bton nas /
T02D1932:53b-13: sems can thams cad tha mal pa'i zhe sdang gi
T02D1932:53b-14: rigs su ltung ba skyob cing mchod pa chen po
T02D1932:53b-15: zhe sdang chen po'i rang gi bdag nyid du bsgom
T02D1932:53b-16: par bya'o // de bzhin du aom dzin ki ka
T02D1932:53b-17: ces kshe'i sa bon la gti mug gshin rje gshed
T02D1932:53b-18: bton la tha mal pa'i gti mug gi rigs su
T02D1932:53b-19: ltung ba'i sems can rnams mchod pa chen po gti
T02D1932:53b-20: mug chen po'i rigs su rab tu bkod nas /
T02D1932:53b-21: yang phyir 'ongs nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i shar gyi
T02D1932:53b-22: rtse mo la zla ba'i gdan la dgod par bya
T02D1932:53b-23: ste / dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1932:53b-24: rtsa ba'i zhal dang lus thams cad dkar po /
T02D1932:53b-25: g-yas nag po g-yon dmar po'o //
T02D1932:53b-26: phyag g-yas pa na 'khor lo dang ral gri dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D1932:53b-27: g-yon na rin po che dang /
T02D1932:53b-29: de bzhin du aom ratna dhrik ces ma'i sa bon las phra ma gshin rje gshed bton la /
T02D1932:53b-30: phra ma'i rigs su ltung ba'i sems can rnams mchod
T02D1932:53b-31: pa chen po phra chen po'i rigs su bkod nas
T02D1932:53b-33: lho phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i nyi ma la dgod par bya ste /
T02D1932:53b-34: rtsa ba'i zhal dang lus thams cad ser po /
T02D1932:53b-35: g-yas dkar po g-yon nag po /
T02D1932:53b-36: de'i phyag g-yas pa rnams la rin po che dang /
T02D1932:53b-37: ral gri dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D1932:53b-38: g-yon pas 'khor lo dang padma dang thod pa'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1932:53b-39: de bzhin du aom a'a ro lik ces me'i sa
T02D1932:53b-40: bon las 'dod chags gshin rje gshed bton la 'dod
T02D1932:53b-41: chags kyi rigs su ltung ba'i sems can la bltas
T02D1932:53b-42: te / mchod pa chen po 'dod chags chen po'i
T02D1932:53b-43: rigs su rab tu gnas par byas nas yang phyir
T02D1932:54a-0: te / log ste / nub phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i nyi ma la @54a * //
T02D1932:54a-2: 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dbang chen po can padma r'a ga'i mdangs dang ldan pa /
T02D1932:54a-4: dmar po rgyan dmar po can /
T02D1932:54a-5: zhal dang po dang lus thams cad dmar po /
T02D1932:54a-6: g-yas dkar po g-yon nag po /
T02D1932:54a-7: g-yas kyi phyag na padma dmar po dang /
T02D1932:54a-8: ral gri dang gri gug / g-yon na 'khor lo dang rin po che dang /
T02D1932:54a-10: de bzhin du aom pra dzny'a dhrik ces de'i sa bon las phrag dog gshin rje gshed bton la /
T02D1932:54a-11: phra dog la zhen pa'i sems can rnams mchod pa
T02D1932:54a-12: chen po phrag dog chen po'i rigs su bkod nas
T02D1932:54a-14: byang gi sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i nyi ma la dgod par bya ste /
T02D1932:54a-16: rtsa ba'i zhal dang lus thams cad ljang gu /
T02D1932:54a-17: ma ra ka ta dang 'dra ba'i mdangs can /
T02D1932:54a-18: g-yas dkar po g-yon nag po /
T02D1932:54a-19: g-yas kyi phyag na ral gri dang /
T02D1932:54a-21: g-yon pas nor bu dang padma dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1932:54a-22: de bzhin du aom mo ha ra ti badzra tsa rtsi k'am zhes pa /
T02D1932:54a-23: dza'i sa bon las bton la /
T02D1932:54a-24: de bzhin du rang gi rigs su gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyi don byas nas /
T02D1932:54a-26: me'i phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi zla ba la dgod par bya ste /
T02D1932:54a-27: gti mug gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1932:54a-28: cung zad bud med kyi cha byad kyis 'gying zhing sgeg pa'o //
T02D1932:54a-29: yang de bzhin du sa'i sa bon las byung ba'i
T02D1932:54a-30: rdo rje phag mo zhe sdang gshin rje gshed dang
T02D1932:54a-31: 'dra ba / dve sha ra ti zhes bya bas phyung nas /
T02D1932:54a-32: de bzhin du rang gi rigs su gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byas nas /
T02D1932:54a-34: bden bral gyi phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi zla ba la dgod do //
T02D1932:54a-35: de bzhin du rlung gi phyogs su do'i sa bon
T02D1932:54a-36: las byung ba'i rdo rje dbyangs can ma 'dod chags
T02D1932:54a-38: r'a ga ra ti zhes bya bas phyung nas de
T02D1932:54a-39: bzhin du rang gi rigs su gtogs pa'i sems can
T02D1932:54a-41: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo gnyis kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do //
T02D1932:54a-42: yang de bzhin du ru'i sa bon las byung ba'i
T02D1932:54a-43: rdo rje goo r'i ma phrag dog gshin rje gshed
T02D1932:54a-44: dang 'dra ba badzra ra ti zhes bya bas bton
T02D1932:54b-0: nas de bzhin du rang gi @54b rigs su gtogs
T02D1932:54b-1: pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byon byas te sna
T02D1932:54b-2: tshogs rdo rje'i dbang ldan gyi rtse mo gnyis la
T02D1932:54b-4: thams cad kyang rang rang gi rigs kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1932:54b-5: yang de bzhin du 'dir ya'i sa bon las byung
T02D1932:54b-6: ba'i tho ba gshin rje gshed rdo rje tho ba
T02D1932:54b-7: 'dzin cing / lhag ma gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba /
T02D1932:54b-10: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa /
T02D1932:54b-11: aom mung+ga ra dhrik ces bya bas bton la /
T02D1932:54b-12: shar phyogs na gnas pa'i bgegs rnams yang dag par btul te /
T02D1932:54b-13: de bzhin du rang gi rigs su gtogs pa rnams kyi don byas nas /
T02D1932:54b-14: slar log ste shar phyogs kyi sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i nyi ma'i gdan la dgod do //
T02D1932:54b-15: de bzhin du 'byung ba ni tstsha'i sa bon las byung ba'i dkar po dang /
T02D1932:54b-17: dmar po ste zhal gsum pa rdo rje dbyig pa dang /
T02D1932:54b-20: g-yon pas 'khor lo dang rin po che dang /
T02D1932:54b-25: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po dbyig pa gshin
T02D1932:54b-26: rje gshed aom danda dhrik ces bya bas phyung la
T02D1932:54b-27: / lho phyogs na gnas pa'i bgegs btul nas /
T02D1932:54b-28: de las spros pas sems can gyi don byas nas //
T02D1932:54b-29: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i gdan la dgod do //
T02D1932:54b-30: yang de lta bu ni ya'i sa bon las byung ba'i sku mdog /
T02D1932:54b-32: dkar po'i dang nag po ste /
T02D1932:54b-34: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis padma dmar po dang /
T02D1932:54b-35: ral gri dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D1932:54b-36: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang /
T02D1932:54b-39: brjed pa dang 'chi bdag gi bdud dang lta ba log pa dang /
T02D1932:54b-40: skye ba'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po padma gshin rje gshed padma dhrik ces bya bas phyung la /
T02D1932:54b-41: nub phyogs na gnas pa'i bgegs btul te /
T02D1932:54b-42: de bzhin du 'gro ba rnams kyi don byas nas
T02D1932:54b-43: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i nyi ma'i gdan la
T02D1932:54b-44: dgod do // de nas de bzhin du de las
T02D1932:54b-45: byung ba'i ra'i sa bon las yang dag par byung
T02D1932:54b-48: dkar po dang nag po ste zhal gsum pa /
T02D1932:55a-1: 'khor lo dang gri gug g-yas pa rnams kyis 'dzin pa /
T02D1932:55a-2: g-yon gyis 'khor lo dang rin po che dang /
T02D1932:55a-3: padma dang thod pa'i snod 'dzin pa /
T02D1932:55a-4: rmugs pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud dang /
T02D1932:55a-5: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1932:55a-6: las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa /
T02D1932:55a-7: ral gri gshin rje gshed aom khadga dhrik ces bya bas bton la /
T02D1932:55a-8: byang phyogs na gnas pa'i bgegs rnams btul nas /
T02D1932:55a-9: de bzhin du sems can gyi don byas te sna
T02D1932:55a-10: tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo'i nyi ma'i gdan la dgod
T02D1932:55a-11: do // yang snam bu gnyis pa'i mtshams bzhir zla ba la phyir rol dang /
T02D1932:55a-12: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i don du de las byung ba'i
T02D1932:55a-13: dang yo dang ni ra bzhi'i sa bon las yang
T02D1932:55a-14: dag par byung ba rnams kyis bdud rtsi lngas yongs
T02D1932:55a-15: su bkang ba'i mi'i thod pa ste /
T02D1932:55a-17: 'di lta bur yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te /
T02D1932:55a-18: snying ga'i sngags las spros pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug la /
T02D1932:55a-19: mdun du bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D1932:55a-20: gang de dang lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs rnams ni /
T02D1932:55a-21: sgo skyong ba rnams kyis bskrad de de rnams nyid ni sngags bzlas pas srung ba byas la /
T02D1932:55a-22: lam la sogs pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1932:55a-23: de ni dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D1932:55a-24: brjod la sgo skyong ba dgug pa dang gzhug pa
T02D1932:55a-26: mnyes pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1932:55a-27: de nas ro mnyam pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1932:55a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid rab tu bsgrubs la /
T02D1932:55a-29: de bzhin du dam tshig dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ro mnyam par gyur pas /
T02D1932:55a-31: dkyil 'khor thams cad la ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02D1932:55a-32: rdo rje gsum rnams gsal por blta'o //
T02D1932:55a-33: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros
T02D1932:55a-34: pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod
T02D1932:55a-35: pa / dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa'i
T02D1932:55a-36: thugs ka'i sngags las byung ba'i lha'i tshogs kyis lo
T02D1932:55a-37: ma'i kha rgyan dang bcas pa'i bum pa'i kha nas
T02D1932:55a-38: 'bab pa'i byang chub sems kyi khu bas rang gi
T02D1932:55a-39: dkyil 'khor pa rnams mngon par dbang bskur ba'i dbu
T02D1932:55a-40: la gshin rje gshed blta bar bya'o //
T02D1932:55b-0: de yang gtso bo'i dbu rgyan @55b ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1932:55b-1: de'i rjes la snying ga'i sngags las nges par byung
T02D1932:55b-2: ba'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnam pa sna
T02D1932:55b-4: nam mkha' khyab par mtshon la snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1932:55b-5: gyi 'od kyis bcug la nor bu'i nang gi lam
T02D1932:55b-6: du khu bar gyur pa de bltas la /
T02D1932:55b-7: de nas 'di ltar dpe med pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis /
T02D1932:55b-8: nam mkha'i dkyil khyab pas khyad par du lhag pa dang /
T02D1932:55b-9: rdo rje tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa bzhis glu dang bcas pas mchod pa byed pa ste /
T02D1932:55b-12: kye kye gshin rje gshed nag po //
T02D1932:55b-13: srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1932:55b-14: bdag gis mthong na shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1932:55b-15: khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di mthong mdzod //
T02D1932:55b-16: mi dang sa 'og rgya mtshor bcas //
T02D1932:55b-17: khyod kyi gar gyis g-yos par mdzod //
T02D1932:55b-19: khro bos ro langs bzhin gar mdzod //
T02D1932:55b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing //
T02D1932:55b-21: mdangs nag tshad ni thung ba la //
T02D1932:55b-22: bde chen ngo bo'i gar mdzod ces //
T02D1932:55b-23: rdo rje dbyangs can ma gsol 'debs //
T02D1932:55b-24: hr'i: shtri:'i sngags dang gar gyis khyod //
T02D1932:55b-25: srid pa gsum gyi 'khrul pa chod //
T02D1932:55b-26: snying rje khros nas gar byed pa //
T02D1932:55b-28: de'i rjes la byin gyis brlab par bya ste ;
T02D1932:55b-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'o //
T02D1932:55b-30: de'i rjes la bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1932:55b-31: gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa //
T02D1932:55b-32: gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02D1932:55b-33: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D1932:55b-34: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1932:55b-35: gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa //
T02D1932:55b-36: phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02D1932:55b-37: rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa //
T02D1932:55b-38: rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1932:55b-39: 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02D1932:55b-41: nyes pa kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso //
T02D1932:55b-42: rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1932:55b-43: phrag dog ngo bo'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1932:55b-44: gshin rje gshed po las kun pa //
T02D1932:55b-45: rdo rje'i sku dang rab tu mtshungs //
T02D1932:55b-46: phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1932:55b-47: sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod //
T02D1932:55b-48: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas //
T02D1932:55b-49: sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso //
T02D1932:56a-1: ba'i ba dan gnyis mtha' gnyis nas phyar ba yam
T02D1932:56a-2: las byung ba gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu'i rlung gi
T02D1932:56a-4: ram yongs su gyur pa las gru gsum pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bltas nas /
T02D1932:56a-5: de'i steng du kam yongs su gyur pa las mi'i mgo bo gsum /
T02D1932:56a-6: de'i steng du yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las padma'i snod /
T02D1932:56a-7: de'i steng du sla ba'i rdzas lnga /
T02D1932:56a-8: aom h'um sva a'a h'a zhes bya bas byin gyis
T02D1932:56a-9: brlabs pas khu ba lnga dang bcas pa bsgoms la
T02D1932:56a-11: de nas ro mnyam par gyur pa de'i steng du
T02D1932:56a-12: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs phar
T02D1932:56a-13: blta'o // de nas de'i 'od kyis zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa de sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1932:56a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan nas /
T02D1932:56a-15: de nas aom de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D1932:56a-16: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
T02D1932:56a-17: bkug nas gcig tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o//
T02D1932:56a-18: de nas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D1932:56a-19: la gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod
T02D1932:56a-20: de / aa yongs su gyur pa las padma dkar po /
T02D1932:56a-21: de'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje spros pas //
T02D1932:56a-22: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi lces myang bas /
T02D1932:56a-23: bdag nyid 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i dngos po thams cad tshim par bya'o //
T02D1932:56a-24: 'di ltar bya ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02D1932:56a-25: de nas bdag pos bskul bas dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyis phyogs bcur spros pas /
T02D1932:56a-26: sems can gyi don byed par bltas la yi ge'i mthar lus nye bar bsdus te /
T02D1932:56a-27: yang spro ba dang bsdu ba rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1932:56a-28: a'a li dang k'a li gnyis su med par ro //
T02D1932:56a-29: de nas thams cad kyi snying gar zla ba la rang rang gi sa bon yi ge bkod la /
T02D1932:56a-30: de nas spro zhing sngags bzlas te /
T02D1932:56a-31: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02D1932:56a-32: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D1932:56a-33: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D1932:56a-34: ya kshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D1932:56a-35: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1932:56a-37: dngos grub phra mo rab tu 'grub pa'o //
T02D1932:56a-39: yang na dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i thugs ka'i zla
T02D1932:56a-40: ba la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bkod la sngags
T02D1932:56a-41: spro zhing bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1932:56a-42: aom hr'i: shtri: wi ki t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1932:56a-43: 'di ni dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i snying po
T02D1932:56b-0: sngags kyi gtso bo @56b las thams cad byed pa'o
T02D1932:56b-1: // yang na yi ge drug pa'i sngags te /
T02D1932:56b-2: aom ya m'anta ka h'um brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad dral ba'i sngags te /
T02D1932:56b-3: sngags re re zhing yang mthu che ste /
T02D1932:56b-4: mdor na las thams cad byed do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1932:56b-11: khyi'i rus pa la bzlas pa'i phreng ba yang dag
T02D1932:56b-12: par byas la mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas pa bya'o
T02D1932:56b-13: // de yang dal bar ma yin /
T02D1932:56b-15: tshig mi gsal bar ma yin /
T02D1932:56b-16: yid kyis bzlas pa ma yin //
T02D1932:56b-20: 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyis ji srid mi skyo
T02D1932:56b-21: bar ma gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o
T02D1932:56b-22: // gal te skyo na dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1932:56b-23: sngar gyi bstod pas yang dag par bstod /
T02D1932:56b-24: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1932:56b-25: yi ge mu: mthar bzhag pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis so //
T02D1932:56b-26: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1932:56b-27: da ni sngags bzlas pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid dang gtor ma nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D1932:56b-28: zla ba'o cog gi bcu bzhi la //
T02D1932:56b-29: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1932:56b-30: sha lnga yis ni byugs byas nas //
T02D1932:56b-31: bzlas na grub pa'i mchog 'grub byad//
T02D1932:56b-32: gsang sngags bzlas pa khri byas na //
T02D1932:56b-33: 'byung po mnye dang de bzhin du //
T02D1932:56b-34: mkha' 'gro ma ni stong bsad pa //
T02D1932:56b-35: mtshams med lnga po byas pas kyang //
T02D1932:56b-37: dge ba bcu la goms pa dang //
T02D1932:56b-38: dbang po las rgyal bla ma gus //
T02D1932:56b-39: nga rgyal khro las rnam grol ba //
T02D1932:56b-40: de yis nges par chen por 'gyur //
T02D1932:56b-41: slong mo byed cing bzlas mi bya //
T02D1932:56b-42: kun du rgyu zhing ma yin te //
T02D1932:56b-43: yan lag mnyams gsang sngags ba zla //
T02D1932:56b-44: gtso bo dngos dang dngos med bdag //
T02D1932:56b-45: rtag tu dam tshig la sogs pa sten //
T02D1932:56b-46: rtsa ba sbom po bsrung bar bya //
T02D1932:56b-47: sems can kun la rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1932:56b-48: rig pas byams pa'i sems mi btang //
T02D1932:56b-49: snying rje mchog gi dbang gyur pas //
T02D1932:56b-50: phyogs bcur gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02D1932:56b-51: nyin re'am yang na zla re'am //
T02D1932:56b-52: lo ni re re dag kyang rung //
T02D1932:56b-53: gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi sbyin //
T02D1932:56b-54: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhir brtag / rtag tu bgegs rnams zhi bya dang //
T02D1932:57a-2: 'byung po kun la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1932:57a-3: rtag tu cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02D1932:57a-4: dkyil 'khor gru gsum bri bar bya //
T02D1932:57a-5: chu dang dri chen bsres pas byug / gshin rje nor bzang rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1932:57a-6: de la phyogs skyod ba rnams dgug / yi ge aom gyis tshangs pa /
T02D1932:57a-12: na yis khyab 'jug / yang na yis rlung /
T02D1932:57a-18: t'a yis thags bzangs ris so //
T02D1932:57a-19: de bzhin du ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa
T02D1932:57a-20: bon las 'od 'phros pas khams gsum na gnas pa
T02D1932:57a-21: rnams bkug la / aom a'a: h'um phem phem phat
T02D1932:57a-22: phat khams gsum thams cad na gnas pa'i lha la
T02D1932:57a-23: rnams bkug la / sogs pa rnams / lha rdzas rdo rje yongs su dag pa'i gtor ma 'di /
T02D1932:57a-25: ma ma sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1932:57a-26: gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bkod pa las bsod nams gang thob ston ka yis //
T02D1932:57a-27: 'o ma'i mtsho bsrubs las skyes zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra ba bdag gi chung zhig gang //
T02D1932:57a-28: de yis bdag ni gshin rje'i rgyal po'i 'dra gnas thob nas nam mkha' gnas kyi bar //
T02D1932:57a-29: sems can 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba ma lus
T02D1932:57a-30: gshin rje gshed du byed par shog / dpal ldan
T02D1932:57a-31: nag po'i sgrub thabs bris pa 'di //
T02D1932:57a-32: gzhung lugs sna tshogs dag dang mngon 'gal bas //
T02D1932:57a-33: yang dag gzhan gyi don du 'di ma byas //
T02D1932:57a-34: mthong ba 'ba' zhig tsam zhig bstan pa yin //
T02D1932:57a-35: sbas pa go bar bya phyir byas las bsod nams gang zhig bsgrubs pa ni //
T02D1932:57a-36: zla ba'i 'od 'dra de yis 'gro ba mtha' dag
T02D1932:57a-37: gshin rje gshed por shog / dpal gshin rje gshed
T02D1932:57a-38: nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las /
T02D1932:57a-39: mkhas pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas /
T02D1932:57a-40: dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la ra kshi tra zhes bya bas bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02D1932:57a-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
